page.title: 11A DAY IN BEVERLEY'S LIFE
page.content: AT HALF PAST SIX I GET DRESSED AND HAVE MY BREAKFAST BY WHICH TIME IT IS 7 O' CLOCK THEN I GO TO FEED MY KITTENS THE KITTENS ARE ABOUT SIX WEEKS OLD THEY EAT 'WHISKERS'TINNED CAT FOOD.BY THEN IT IS 8 O'CLOCK AND MY FRIEND ANDREA COMES AROUND FOR ME I GO WITH HER TO SEE OUR FOUR KITTENS AGAIN WE GO TO SCHOOL AT 9 O'CLOCK. EACH DAY AT SCHOOL BEGINS WITH AN ASSEMBLY IN THE HALL. THE REMAINDER OF THE DAY IS SPENT DOING A VARIETY OF LESSONS.AT HALF PAST THREE WE GO HOME AGAIN WHEN I GO OUT TO PLAY. AT ABOUT 4 O' clock ANDREA AND I GO TO MY NANNAS AND FEED OUR KITTENS AGAIN. WE TAKE HER DOG FOR A WALK AND AT ABOUT HALF PAST FIVE I HAVE MY TEA AND FEED THE KITTENS AGAIN. I OFTEN WATCH TELEVISION IN THE EVENING AND GO TO BED AT ABOUT HALF PAST NINE.
